column2: Sign 2K Sports and the NFL Petition  The gaming community needs and wants them to get back together so they can develop sports football videogames
column5: This is important because EA Sports has the rights to the NFL in a choke hole.  We the fans should have the last say so in what sports games should be publish to the public.  The last great football simulation game was NFL 2k5 and everyone knows it! I mean there has been some pretty good Madden games over the years but it doesn't come close to what 2k Sports produced in the past. Please sign my petition and help let the gaming industry know ,,,Sign 2K Sports and the NFL Petition
